description: This 100% recycled polyester/cotton crew sweatshirt is made with 24 plastic bottles and 0.7 pounds of cotton scrap, using 95% less water and producing 53% less CO2 compared to a conventional cotton sweatshirt. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Fitz Roy Horizons Uprisal Crew Sweatshirt - Unisex
